nimble:ShrinkRayGun.NAME: Shrink Ray Gun
nimble:ShrinkRayGun.FLAVOR: I'll be harder to hit when smaller - brilliant!
DESCRIPTIONS: Shrinks you during combat and converts HP into agility, which currently grants a #y
% chance to dodge unblocked damage and gain buffer at turn start if you have none. This and HP loss reduce agility, healing restores it.

nimble:SnakeskinBelt.NAME: Snakeskin Belt
DESCRIPTIONS: Always attempt to dodge, regardless of block. Dodging no longer reduces agility.
